body.name: REALINN Under Sink Organizer and Storage, 2 Pack Pull Out Cabinet Organizer Slide Out Sink Shelf Cabinet Storage Shelves, Under Sink Storage for Kitchen Bathroom Cabinet
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 45 mins
features: 【L Shaped Design】L-shaped design with narrow top and wide bottom, leaves space for plumbing and garbage disposal, maximizing the vertical space of the sink. And the bottom tier leaves a suitable space for your tall bottles, which can solve your cabinet storage troubles.
【Sliding Storage Drawer】The under sink organizer is designed as a sliding drawer with handles, can be pulled out from both sides, allowing you to easily access the items stored at the bottom.
【Easy Installation & Stable】No tools required. It only takes a few seconds to install. Double design with bottom suction cups and tapes. No need to punch mounting screws, but more stable than it is.

【Durable & Clean】Made of high quality steel, can bear 50 lbs. With baking paint, beautiful and rust-proof. Sink shelf is grid design to prevent water accumulation; 2 pads to prevent objects from falling, removable and washable.

【Multi-purpose Organizer】Assembled Dimensions: 14.2*10.6*11 in. Top basket: 14.2*4.8*2.3 in, bottom basket: 14.2*8.9*3 in. The bottom area can hold bottles up to 8 inches in height. (Warm Tips: Please take measurements before ordering.）Ideal for sinks, kitchens and bathrooms. It can be used as bathroom toiletries storage, kitchen spice rack or laundry room storage, etc. to keep your items organized and in order.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: REALINN 2-Tier Pull Out Under Sink Organizer -- -- Make Your Home More Organized and Beautiful Are protruding pipes and garbage disposals under the sink getting in the way of your storage plans? Do you always have taller bottles and cans that are difficult to store? REALINN L-Shape 2 Tier Organizer can solve your worries! Our under-cabinet storage is designed in an L shape, the top rack can be easily installed on the left or right side, giving you the flexibility to work around the plumbing and organize more efficiently. And the organizer features a slide-out drawer with handles, can be pulled out from both sides, allowing you to easily access the items stored at the bottom. Under sink organizer ideal for sinks, bathrooms, kitchens, pantries, and offices. Can be used as bathroom toiletries storage, kitchen spice rack or office supplies rack, etc. Make Your Home More Organized and Beautiful.
Take your storage space from cluttered to neat and beautiful

Heavy Duty Metal Frame Made of high-quality metal, heavy-duty and durable. Holds Up to 50 Lbs. Push & Pull Design It is designed as a sliding drawer with handles, can be pushed and pulled, allowing you to easily access the items stored at the bottom. Elevated Guardrail Elevated guardrails to prevent bottles from falling down. Grid Design & Rubber Pads Sink shelf is grid design to prevent water accumulation; 2 pads to prevent objects from falling, removable and washable.
Ideal for under sinks, cabinet, kitchens and bathrooms. It can be used as bathroom toiletries storage, kitchen spice rack or laundry room storage, etc. to keep your items organized and in order.
Easy Installation Splice the bracket and the bracket symmetrically.Inlay the small hanging basket on the bracket.Push the large basket into the track.Match two pads into the baskets.

Under Sink Organizer Under Sink Organizer [2 Pack] Adjustable Under Sink Organizer Double Sliding Under Sink Organizer Under Sink Organizer [2 Pack] Magnetic Spice Rack Slide Out ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✘ Quantity 1 Pack 2 Pack 2 Pack 1 Pack 2 Pack 4 Pack

If placing a sink organizer, the cabinet dimensions would be at least Width:11", Depth:15", Height:16". For two sink organizers, the cabinet dimensions should be at least Width:22", Depth:15", Height:16". And please check for obstructions at back of cabinet ( plumbing, garbage disposal, etc).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfectly in 36" sinkbase and still have room for the trash can
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the 2 pack. They arrived quickly, appropriately packaged, and mostly assembled. All I had to do was insert the metal supports for the top shelf into the base, attach the included suction cups to the bottom and hang (literally) the top shelf. The suction cups work great and keep the unit in place when pulling and pushing the bottom shelf forward and back. The bottom drawer slides forward for easy access to things stored in the back. One drawer slides smoothly, the second not so much, but I can live with it. The organizers are sturdy and hold everything that I had in the cabinet. The top shelf is large enough to hold plastic canisters of wipes, sponges, bars of soap, powdered cleansers,, etc. I can see and access everything easily. I am happy with these organizers and would buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I liked that right out of the box, I could put it together in 2 seconds, no instruction needed. It was sturdy, well made, & fit perfectly under my sink & easily held all my stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice organizer that works, a little bit cheaply made
reviews.reviewText: Arrived as it should have. Everything was in the box. Requires NO TOOLS! Hooray! Fits together well. It’s a little flimsy but will work for what I’m using it for. If you are going to take things out of it and slide the drawer a lot, go for a more sturdy model. Well worth the price though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Sturdy, functional and fits. My under sink area looks so much better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not completely happy.
reviews.reviewText: I was trying to add pics & will but the pics on line look better than the product definitely. I bought 2 & they are so not great quality for the price….no way. I’m keeping them because I think they are useable & I’m being very lazy but they seem smaller than I imagined..so get out the tape measure & it’s 11 x14 each. So those pics of the under the sink space on line must be a VERY SMALL..and I live in an apt so my under the sink is small..so not sure what those online pics are about? Because 11 x14 didn’t go far under my sink. So small & felt wobbly & wonky..don’t expect any kind of sturdy here. No way. The metal is sturdy but nothing else about it is. I wish I had not ordered them but I’ve been under the sink for an hour & a half trying to figure out some kind of yes this works but it really doesn’t and I am OVER it. Not worth it no way on my opinion. No no no.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This item was easy to put together, easy to read instructions. Very sturdy. Holds all my items underneath the sink. Bottom shelf slides out for easy access. I'm very pleased with the shelf. I'm glad I bought 2.T S

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Space saving & sturdy
reviews.reviewText: These handy little under sink shelves fit perfectly under our bathroom vanity, freeing up much needed space to organize products. The slide out drawer is also a plus. It’s made of metal and is sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for small areas
reviews.reviewText: Helps to organize those small areas. I purchased the 2-pack and was able to declutter under two sinks. I really liked the concept. Not real sturdy, in my opinion, but worked find for me. Would buy again.
